name: Hopeless V2 mvp
description:
Our Story

Our character tries to find his parents and she believes that she can reach them by gathering torn pieces of her parents' picture. The player tries to collect picture pieces for the final photo frame so that they can get into and pass to the next level.

Thanks To Everyone helping us
